topic.title: I need money help!!!!!!!!!!!
topic.body: Pls,guys ,here a good chance to get much more money,it can be 1000,000,000.But i need much BTC,this is my wallet:1GgjDQrqXqPgoSbaLD1j6Gjm8jcw18YPmz

。。。Brother, I'm not going to give you Bitcoin. You can recharge my Bitcoin purse if you want, and then leave your contact information.
